messages.subject: Re: Something For Stevie
messages.msgSnippet: I really liked this story and as a truck driver myself, it was VERY NICE to read a positive story about truckers.  Believe me, alot of truckers are very much
messages.messageBody:
I really liked this story and as a truck driver
myself, it was VERY NICE to read a positive story
about truckers. Believe me, alot of truckers are very
much like the ones in this story.

Theres been alot of advertising lately that directly
or indirectly makes truckers look bad or like
"killers". Car ads show "four wheelers" nimbly
dodging big trucks and avoiding being slowed from
getting to their destination or being in an accident
accident, Phamacuetical companies with big trucks to
have you buy their medications for those big "killer"
headaches.

Sigh
